item.description:
Every 2nd and 4th Friday evening is Dinner With Dharma at the Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center at 950 Massachusetts Avenue, between Central and Harvard Squares, Cambridge.

6:30 p.m. Meditation (Sitting and Breathing, led by a Buddhist nun or a leader in training)
7:00 p.m. Dinner (vegan - but ALWAYS ask because it reminds them)
Cost (Include vegan buffet dinner) PLEASE BRING CASH ONLY. THEY are unable to accept Credit Cards!!
Adult: $10 Student: $5 (student ID required for the $5 half price)

7:45 p.m. Dharma Talk and Discussion (scheduled to finish around 9:00 pm)

Tonight, there is a special presentation by temple member Peter Martin (Marjorie's husband), entitled "Ven. Master Hsing Yun & Fo Guang Shan". GBBCC is one of over 200 worldwide branch temples, and Peter will discuss the life and accomplishments of the temple's spiritual leader and the founder of Fo Guang Shan monastic order.

Peter Martin is an architect, urban designer, and teacher, and he also is a board member of BLIA (Buddha's Light International Association), the lay person's organization of FGS, and a volunteer cook at the GBBCC temple, which provides the lovely vegan buffet each 2nd and 4th Friday evening for the vegan buffet dinner side of the Dinner with Dharma.

PLEASE BRING CASH ONLY. GBBCC is not prepared to honor Credit Cards!!!

Take the T to Central Square, http://www.mbta.com....
Walk in TOWARDS Harvard Square until you see 950 Mass Ave on the left (south) side of the street.

Please invite friends and family. If you have any questions, please call the GBBCC.

Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center - Omitofo for the event at GBBCC
950 Massachusetts Avenue (#1 bus, between Red Line stops at Central Square and Harvard Square)
Cambridge, MA
617-547-6670

http://www.GBBC.net... - IF you speak and read Mandarin - Chinese language site has a security warning, but it's SAFE
PHOTOS of the Buddhist Tea House interior
http://www.yelp.com/b...
http://gbbcc.net/port...

For driving directions please check here
http://maps.google.co...
http://maps.google.co...
http://bit.ly/dByxK8...
http://pluralism.org/... - HDS Pluralism Project Profile-Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center (GBBCC) - includes history and statistics

We look forward to seeing you there! We'll be there from 6:30pm to 8:30pm, maybe 10 pm, if we like the talk(s).

For more info. for this place, please check http://www.yelp.com/b... (please visit Maynard's pictures of the place)
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at GBBCC who seems to be 'in the know'

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner With Dharma: Greater Boston Buddhist Cultural Center, 950 Mass Ave
